div.p: THE MISSION OF PRESIDIO ISD IN PARTNERSHIP WITH A UNIFIED COMMUNITY IS TO GRADUATE STUDENTS WHO ARE BOTH CAREER AND COLLEGE READY AND HAVE THE ABILITY TO COMPETE ON A WORLD STAGE
PRESIDIO INDEPENDENT SCHOOL DISTRICT DOES NOT DISCRIMINATE ON THE BASIS OF RACE, RELIGION, COLOR, SEX, GENDER, NATIONAL ORIGIN, DISABILITY OR AGE IN ITS PROGRAMS AND ACTIVITIES.
The mission of Presidio ISD in partnership with a Unified Community is to graduate students who are both career and college ready and have the ability to compete on a world stage.
